Package edu.ncsu.csc216.issue_manager.model.issue

Class Issue

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.issue_manager.model.issue.Issue
public class Issue extends Object
Class for managing and modifying Issue objects

  • Constructor Details

    • Issue

      public Issue(int issueId, Issue.IssueType issueType, String summary, String note)
      Constructor for an issue object
      Parameters:
      issueId - the id of the issue
      issueType - whether it is a bug or enhancement
      summary - summary of the issue
      note - any notes associated with the issue
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the issue is not valid

    • Issue

      public Issue(int issueId, String state, String issueType, String summary, String owner, boolean confirmed, String resolution, ArrayList<String> notes)
      Alternative constructor for an issue object
      Parameters:
      issueId - Id of the issue
      state - current state of the issue
      issueType - whether it is a bug or enhancement
      summary - summary of the issue
      owner - assigned owner of the issue
      confirmed - if the issue was confirmed or not
      resolution - resolution state of the issue
      notes - any additional notes for the issue
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the issue is invalid
